job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtjob descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggta software development company is looking for a site reliability engineer to join their team on a fulltime direct hire basis youd be joining a team of unique problem solvers with a multitude of skills and perspectives youll be responsible for taking the lead on relevant projects while surrounded by people who will provide support and mentorshipltbrgtltbrgtas a site reliability engineer youll mainly be focused on running better production application and systems creating a strict engineering discipline and utilizing software and systems to help find creative engineering solutions to operational problemsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtrequired skills ampamp experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtazure and awsltligtltligtazure devopsltligtltligtscripting in either java or powershellltligtltligtterraform and ansibleltligtltligtkubernetesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtdesired skills ampamp experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt years of experience in an devops environmentltligtltligtoracleltligtltligtspringbootltligtltligtdockerltbrgtltligtltulgtltugtthe offerltbrgtltugtltulgtltligtcompetitive salary up to kyear doeltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtyou will receive the following benefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligthealth dental visionltligtltligtkltligtltligtcasual and flexible work culture and environmentltligtltligtability to work in a techdriven companyltbrgtltligtltulgtapplicants must be currently authorized to work in the united states on a fulltime basis now and in the futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtposted byltstronggt connor bowlesltbrgtltbrgt
